name: ExplainwhatyourStartupdoes
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: explain my startup
des:
Alexa will explain in a simple and joke way what your startup is about. 
So, if you are a startupper you could use this skill to explain to your friends what's your job. 

Credits to isthisforthat website and their APIs.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
